title: Sushi & Me classes include food, beverages, and keepsakes
statement: Classes begin with non-alcohol beverages, edamame and shrimp tempura, and include aprons, certificates, and two keepsake photos.

citations.quote: Sushi & Me Class begins with a non-alcohol beverage, edamame and shrimp tempura. Each party will receive a Benihana children's and adult apron, one Sushi & Me Certificate and two keepsake photos.
